Text.Page:
There's a huge problem in Fyrmount. The giant hydrath and fimbrilisk kind.

Head to Molten Reach and destroy the {@LinkCreature:4#3011#maraseps} and {@LinkCreature:4#3021#soulstalkers}.

Report to Tifane at Firebase Valor when the mission is complete.
That's a huge help, <PCNAME>. Thank you.
I'm afraid we're going to need a bit more from you. Head out and try again.
